下一回合对敌方全体造成250%大量炎火伤害，之后的每回合伤害相较上回合提升y%，直到吕涅受到伤害为止。
如果被打断，那么自身陷入眩晕。
如果消耗，则伤害提升100%。
伤害提升的公式：
y=50%*0.85^(x-3)，其中x为当前回合数，
计施放技能的回合为第1回合，第3回合开始有效。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BuffsDebuffs_De.enhanced:
Buff and Debuff base duration is 3 turns.

Regen: Recover 10% Health on turn start.
Powerful: Deal 25% more damage.
Shell: Take 20% less damage.
Rush: Speed is increased by 33%.

Powerless: Deal 20% less damage.
Defenceless: Take 25% more damage.
Slow: Speed is decreased by 25%.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BuffsDebuffs_De.ori:
Regen heals the Character by 10% max Health at the beginning of their turn.
Powerful amplifies the Character's damage by 25%.
Rush increases the Speed of the Character by 33%.
Shell reduces the damage received by the Character by 20%.

Powerless reduces the Character's damage dealt by 20%.
Slow reduces the Speed of the Character by 25%.
Defenceless increases the damage received by the Character by 25%.

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.enhanced:
Maelle can use Battle stances during combat. She recovers 1 AP when switching stances.

- In Defensive stance: Take 50% less damage and recover 1 AP on Parry or Dodge.
- In Offensive stance: Deal and take 50% more damage.
- In Virtuose stance: Deal 200% more damage and trigger  or  conditional effects of Skills.

Base Attacks in Offensive stance or in Defensive stance switch her to the opposite stance.
If Maelle switches to a stance she is already in, she instead becomes Stanceless, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.ori:
Maelle's Skills change her Battle Stance.

- Defensive Stance: takes less damage and gains 1 AP per Parry or Dodge.
- Offensive Stance: deals more damage but takes increased damage.
- Virtuose Stance: deals a lot more damage.

Switching to a new stance also provides Maelle with 1 AP

Switch between Stances without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.loc_ori:
玛埃尔可以通过技能改变自己的战斗姿态。

- 她采用防守站姿时，受到的伤害减少，而且每次格挡或闪避可以获得1个行动点。
- 她采用进攻站姿时，造成的伤害更高，但受到的伤害也更高。
- 她采用高手站姿时，造成的伤害大大提升。

玛埃尔切换这3种姿态时，还会获得1个行动点。

无缝轮换3种站姿，才能让玛埃尔充分发挥技能的效果。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.enhanced:
Maelle can use Battle stances during combat. She recovers 1 AP when switching stances.

- In Defensive stance: Take 50% less damage and recover 1 AP on Parry or Dodge.
- In Offensive stance: Deal and take 50% more damage.
- In Virtuose stance: Deal 200% more damage and trigger Defensive or Offensive conditional effects of Skills.

Base Attacks in Offensive stance or in Defensive stance switch her to the opposite stance.
If Maelle switches to a stance she is already in, she instead becomes Stanceless, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty.

Switch between stances without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.ori:
Maelle's Skills change her Battle Stance.

- In Defensive Stance, she takes less damage and gains 1 AP per Parry or Dodge.
- In Offensive Stance, she deals more damage but takes increased damage.
- In Virtuose Stance, she deals a lot more damage.
- Entering any of these 3 Stances  also provides Maelle with 1 AP

Using the Base Attack in Offensive Stance or in Defensive Stance switches her to the opposite Stance.
If Maelle switches to a Stance she is already in, she becomes Stanceless, which doesn't provide any bonus or penalty.

Switch between Stances without interruption to maximise her Skills' effects.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_MaelleUniqueMecha.loc_ori:
玛埃尔可以通过技能改变自己的战斗姿态。

- 她采用防守站姿时，受到的伤害减少，而且每次格挡或闪避可以获得1个行动点。
- 她采用进攻站姿时，造成的伤害更高，但受到的伤害也更高。
- 她采用高手站姿时，造成的伤害大大提升。
- 玛埃尔采用这3种姿态时，还会获得1个行动点。

进攻站姿期间，发动基础攻击会切换防守站姿，防守站姿期间，发动基础攻击也会切换进攻站姿。
如果玛埃尔再次切换自己当前所用的站姿，就会进入无站姿状态，这个时候不享受加成，也不会受到惩罚。

适当轮换站姿，才能让玛埃尔充分发挥技能的效果。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.enhanced:
All enemies have a Break bar below their Health Bar.
When receiving damage from any source, the Break bar fills proportionally to damage received and the source's [Break multiplier].

When the Break bar is full, the enemy can then be Stunned by specific Skills, like Overcharge. Stun usually lasts 1 turn.

A Stunned enemy takes 20% more damage.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.ori:
All enemies have a Break Bar situated below their Health Bar.
The Break Bar fills when they receive damage from any source, proportional to the damage received.
Skills with multiple hits deal less damage to the Break Bar.

When the Break Bar is full, the enemy can then be Broken by specific Skills, like Overcharge.

A Broken enemy takes 20% increased damage and is usually Stunned for 1 turn.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.loc_ori:
所有敌方都有击破槽，显示在生力条下方。
只要敌方受到伤害，击破槽就会填充，幅度取决于伤害大小。
多段攻击技能对击破槽的影响相对较小。

击破槽填满时，过荷等特定技能可以击破敌方。

敌方处于击破状态时，所受伤害提升20%，通常还会眩晕1回合。
ST_Tutorial_Cards.BASICS_BreakBar_Descri.loc_mod:
所有敌方都有击破槽，显示在生命值条下方。
只要敌方受到伤害。击破槽就会填充，幅度取决于伤害大小。
多段攻击技能对击破槽的影响相对较小。

击破槽填满时，过荷等特定技能可以击破敌方。

敌方处于击破状态时，所受伤害提升20%，通常还会眩晕1回合。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.enhanced:
During your turn, your Character can Attack, Aim, use a Skill, or use an Item.
Skills consume AP to use.

You can recover AP by performing a Base Attack or Parry.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.ori:
During your turn, your Character can Attack, Aim, use a Skill, or use an Item.
Skills consume AP to use.

You can gain AP by performing a Base Attack or Parry.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.loc_ori:
你的回合中，角色可以攻击、瞄准、使用技能或物品。
施展技能需要消耗行动点。

行动点可以靠基础攻击和格挡来积攒。
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_BattleWheel_Descr.loc_mod:

施展技能需要消耗行动点。

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.enhanced:
Verso gains Perfection when dealing damage, on Parry or on Dodge. Perfection rank is increased at the following threshold:
C: 3, B: 8, A: 15, S: 30

Verso deals 25% more damage at rank C, doubled for each rank increase. (D: 0%, C: 25%, B: 50%, A: 100%, S: 200%)
Taking any damage decreases Perfection rank (once per enemy turn).

Some Skills have additional effects at specific Perfection ranks.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.ori:
Verso gains Perfection every time he deals damage or manages to Parry or Dodge.

A higher Perfection Rank increases his damage. Some Skills have additional effects at specific Perfection Ranks.

Taking any damage removes 1 Perfection Rank (once per enemy turn).
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.loc_ori:
维尔索造成伤害、成功格挡和闪避都能获得至臻。

至臻层阶越高，造成的伤害就越高。维尔索达到特定至臻层阶时，部分技能会触发额外效果。

维尔索只要受到伤害，至臻层阶便会降低1阶（每个敌方回合最多触发一次）
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_VersoUniqueMechan.loc_mod:
维尔索造成伤害、成功格挡和闪避都能获得至臻。

维尔索只要受到伤害。至臻层阶便会降低1阶（每个敌方回合最多触发一次）

ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.enhanced:
Sciel uses Skills that can consume or apply Foretell (max 10) to enemies.

Skills that apply Foretell generate Sun charges
Skills that consume Foretell generate Moon charges
If Sciel has Sun charges, she recovers +1 AP per Foretell consumed by Moon Skills.
If she has Moon charges, she recovers +1 AP per Foretell applied by Sun Skills.

 If Sciel has both Sun and Moon charges at turn start, all charges are consumed to enter Twilight for 2 turns:
- Deal +25% more damage per charge consumed.
- Foretell application is doubled.
- Foretell max increased to 20.
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.ori:
Some of Sciel's Skills apply Foretell to enemies (10 max. per enemy). These generate Sun charges
Other Skills can consume the applied Foretell in order to amplify their effects. These generate Moon charges

If Sciel has Sun and Moon charges, she consumes all charges to enter Twilight
Twilight lasts 2 turns and applies the following effects:
- increases damage dependent on the amount of charges consumed
- doubles Foretell applied with Skills
- increases the Foretell cap per enemy to 20
ST_Tutorial_Cards.CARD_ScielUniqueMechan.loc_ori:
熙艾尔的部分技能可以对敌方施加先见（每个敌方最多10层），这些技能会产生旭日元能。
其余技能则可以消耗施加给敌人的先见以加强自身效果，这些技能会产生朗月元能。

如果熙艾尔同时拥有旭日元能和朗月元能，她就会消耗所有元能，进入薄暮。
薄暮持续2回合，效果如下：
-伤害提升，幅度取决于所消耗元能的数量
-技能施加的先见层数翻倍
-最多可对每个敌方施加20层先见
